FAQ.metaDescription: Find answers to common questions about ordering, shipping, warranty, and products.
FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions
FAQ.contactUs: Our team is ready to assist you

ordering.title: Ordering
ordering.q1: How do I place an order?
ordering.a1: Simply browse our products, add items to cart, and checkout. You can pay on delivery.
ordering.q2: Can I modify my order after placing it?
ordering.a2: Contact us within 1 hour of placing your order and we can make changes.
ordering.q3: Is there a minimum order amount?
ordering.a3: No minimum order. However, orders under 500 EGP have a 40 EGP shipping fee.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.a1: 1-2 days for Cairo/Giza, 3-5 days for other governorates.
shipping.a2: Yes! You'll receive a tracking link via WhatsApp once your order ships.
shipping.q3: Do you deliver to my area?
shipping.a3: We deliver to all Egyptian governorates.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.a1: 18 months for Anker products, 12 months for Joyroom products.
warranty.a2: Contact us on WhatsApp with your order number and describe the issue.
warranty.a3: Warranty is tied to the original purchase, not transferable.

products.title: Products
products.a1: Yes! We are an authorized dealer for Anker and Joyroom in Egypt.
products.q2: What's the difference between Anker and Joyroom?
products.a2: Anker is premium with longer warranty. Joyroom offers great value at lower prices.
products.a3: Absolutely! Contact us on WhatsApp and we'll help you choose the right product.

payment.title: Payment
payment.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a1: Cash on Delivery (COD) is our main payment method.
payment.a2: Currently we only accept Cash on Delivery.
payment.a3: Yes! You only pay when you receive and inspect your order.

Privacy.metaDescription: Learn how Cairo Volt protects your personal information and privacy.
Privacy.title: Privacy Policy

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content:
We collect information you provide when placing orders:
â€¢ Name and contact information
â€¢ Shipping address
â€¢ Phone number
â€¢ Order history

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content:
Your information is used to:
â€¢ Process and deliver your orders
â€¢ Send order updates via WhatsApp
â€¢ Improve our services
â€¢ Handle warranty claims

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content:
We only share your information with:
â€¢ Shipping companies (for delivery)
â€¢ Payment processors (if applicable)
We never sell your personal data to third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience and remember your preferences. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content:
You have the right to:
â€¢ Access your personal data
â€¢ Request correction of inaccurate data
â€¢ Request deletion of your data
â€¢ Opt out of marketing communications

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions, contact us via WhatsApp or email. We're committed to addressing your concerns promptly.

Terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions for shopping at Cairo Volt.
Terms.title: Terms & Conditions

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By placing an order on Cairo Volt, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before making a purchase.

orders.title: Orders
orders.content:
â€¢ All orders are subject to availability
â€¢ We reserve the right to refuse or cancel orders
â€¢ Order confirmation will be sent via WhatsApp
â€¢ Prices are in Egyptian Pounds (EGP)

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: All prices are displayed in Egyptian Pounds and include applicable taxes. Prices may change without notice, but confirmed orders will be honored at the quoted price.

shipping.title: Shipping & Delivery
shipping.content:
â€¢ Delivery times are estimates, not guarantees
â€¢ Free shipping for orders over 500 EGP
â€¢ Cash on Delivery is available
â€¢ Risk of loss transfers upon delivery

returns.title: Returns & Exchanges
returns.content:
â€¢ Products can be returned within 14 days if unused and in original packaging
â€¢ Defective products are covered under warranty
â€¢ Return shipping costs may apply
â€¢ Refunds processed within 7 business days

warranty.title: Product Warranty
warranty.content:
All products carry manufacturer warranty:
â€¢ Anker products: 18 months
â€¢ Joyroom products: 12 months
Warranty covers manufacturing defects only.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Cairo Volt is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our liability is limited to the purchase price of the product.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Continued use constitutes acceptance of modified terms.
